channel.title: CVE Feed for VICIdial -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VICIdial -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8503|2024-09-10T21:02:45.121Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can leverage a time-based SQL injection vulnerability in VICIdial to enumerate database records. By default, VICIdial stores plaintext credentials within the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-8503|2024-09-10T19:36:08.120Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can leverage a time-based SQL injection vulnerability in VICIdial to enumerate database records. By default, VICIdial stores plaintext credentials within the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-8504|2024-09-10T19:23:39.327Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An attacker with authenticated access to VICIdial as an "agent" can execute arbitrary shell commands as the "root" user. This attack can be chained with CVE-2024-8503 to execute arbitrary shell commands starting from an unauthenticated perspective.
